problems.title: Sum of Digits Recursively
problems.description:
Write a recursive function to find the sum of digits of a given non-negative integer N.

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
Print the sum of digits of N.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
1234

Sample Output
10

Sample Input
5

Sample Output
5
hintsList: Think about the base case and the recursive step.
